content.rendered:
Maple Ave Morning Announcements 

Wednesday June 4th, 2025 

Today is an “A” Day  

 

  • Library book checkout is over for this school year! The library needs all the books back as soon as possible, so please return them! You and your parents will continue to receive overdue notices and will be asked to replace your lost books! If you need your book for a book project, please talk to the library staff for an extension. Remember to BE RESPONSIBLE! 

 

  • Today is the last Yearbook in room B105 at 2:35 

 

  • Any girl interested in running cross country in the fall, there will be an informational meeting on Wednesday, June 11th in Mr. Reilly’s room, S282. No cuts, and no benches; just supportive teammates and coaches. Hope to see you there! 

 

  • The last Attention Pop Culture Icon Club meeting is tomorrow after school in the Large Group Room. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. 

 

Today’s lunch is a chef special, chicken parmesan, seasoned pasta, green beans, fresh fruit and vegetables. 

Be Safe, Be Respectful, Be responsible and Be KIND.  

As Always, make it a great day or not… the choice is yours.
